body: It appears that `spack install openmpi@3.0.0 schedulers=slurm fabrics=pmi` installs with verbs instead of the specified pmi fabric. When I look at the resulting build.out, I can see the configure arguments contain "--with-verbs --without-pmi". If I delete the "default=" line from OpenMPI's package.py, the build.out correctly shows "--without-verbs --with-pmi"
title: Multi-valued variant ignored in presence of default keyword
